page.title: 06THE LOCAL HUNT GILLING WEST
page.content: The {ZETLAND HUNT }goes through Gilling. The people who wear the red coats are the {Masters of the Hunt. One Master has a hunting horn which he blows when he loses sight of the hounds.Before the Hunt begins, the riders gather together. This is called the {Meet.}The {Master of the Hounds} brings the fox_hounds to the Meet in a horse_box. After the Meet everybody goes to a wood in the area and the hounds sniff for foxes. If they find a fox they chase it until either they lose it or catch it and kill it. If it goes down a hole the masters will send a terrier down after it.While the hounds are in the wood all the riders spread them- selves out so that if a fox comes out they can shake their hats in the air and give a{"Holloa"}so the hounds can get on to the track of the fox.
